about_the_game:
Overlay Studio brings desktop personalisation to the next level! Decorate your monitor with various types of static and animated overlays. Download overlays from your favourite series or games from the Steam Workshop and combine them to make your own unique presets. Cannot find the overlay you want? Overlay Studio allows you to create your own overlays and share them with the world using the Workshop.



  • Create your own video or picture overlays from existing sources. Full support for transparent PNGs, GIFs and WEBMs.
  • Feeling more adventurous? Create browser-based overlays that are fully scriptable.
  • Contains an overlay library to keep track of all your created and downloaded overlays.
  • Possibility to add up to 100 active overlays to your screen.
  • Save your favourite overlay combinations by creating presets.
  • Share your overlays with the world using the Steam Workshop.
  • Support for multiple displays.
  • Adjustable settings to change the graphics performance.
  • Ability to easily move, size, rotate and flip overlays while in editing mode.
  • Overlays can be made partially transparent so that it is still possible to see the working area behind them.
  • Ability to quickly hide all overlays.

Download overlays from your favourite series or games from the Steam Workshop and combine them to make your own unique presets. Cannot find the overlay you want? Overlay Studio allows you to create your own overlays and share them with the world using the Workshop.

name: Overlay Studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM

short_description: Overlay Studio brings desktop personalisation to the next level! Decorate your monitor with various types of static and animated overlays to create your own unique computer environment. Create your own overlays and share them on the Steam Workshop.
